languages.text: {n}Вопрос, кажется, застает Ардженту врасплох.{/n} "Желала ли я? Но это была бы позорная слабость, почти ересь! Конечно, нет. Я рождена для этого. Я живу по воле {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} и в свете Его, я сама есть свет, должна быть светом — для себя и для тех, кто обращается ко мне за защитой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вопрос, кажется, застает Ардженту врасплох.{/n} "Желала ли я? Но это была бы позорная слабость, почти ересь! Конечно, нет. Я рождена для этого. Я живу по воле {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} и в свете Его, я сама есть свет, должна быть светом — для себя и для тех, кто обращается ко мне за защитой".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}The question seems to catch Argenta off guard.{/n} "Have I ever...? But that would be shameful weakness, almost heresy! Of course not. I was born for this. I live by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."
languages.original_text: {n}Вопрос, кажется, застает Ардженту врасплох.{/n} "Желала ли я? Но это была бы позорная слабость, почти ересь! Конечно, нет. Я рождена для этого. Я живу по воле {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} и в свете Его, я сама есть свет, должна быть светом — для себя и для тех, кто обращается ко мне за защитой".

I live by the Emperor's will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

I live by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor's{/g} will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."

traits.locale_text: {n}The question seems to catch Argenta off guard.{/n} "Have I ever...? But that would be shameful weakness, almost heresy! Of course not. I was born for this. I live by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}这个问题似乎让阿洁塔措手不及。{/n}“我有没有期望过……？可那会是可耻的弱点，几乎算是异端邪说！当然没有，我生来就是为了成为修女。我为{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的意志而生。在祂的明光中，我也成为了明光。我必须成为明光，这既是为了我自己，也是为了那些寻求我保护的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The question seems to catch Argenta off guard.{/n} "Have I ever...? But that would be shameful weakness, almost heresy! Of course not. I was born for this. I live by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个问题似乎让阿洁塔措手不及。{/n}“我有没有期望过……？可那会是可耻的弱点，几乎算是异端邪说！当然没有，我生来就是为了成为修女。我为{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的意志而生。在祂的明光中，我也成为了明光。我必须成为明光，这既是为了我自己，也是为了那些寻求我保护的人。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The question seems to catch Argenta off guard.{/n} "Have I ever...? But that would be shameful weakness, almost heresy! Of course not. I was born for this. I live by the Emperor's will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."

languages.text: {n}La pregunta parece sorprender a Argenta con la guardia baja.{/n} «¿Que si he...? ¡Eso sería una debilidad vergonzosa, prácticamente una herejía! Claro que no. Nací para esto. Vivo por la voluntad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} y en Su luz. Yo misma soy esa luz. Debo serlo, tanto para mí como para quienes piden mi protección».
languages.original_text: {n}The question seems to catch Argenta off guard.{/n} "Have I ever...? But that would be shameful weakness, almost heresy! Of course not. I was born for this. I live by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."

traits.locale_text: {n}La pregunta parece sorprender a Argenta con la guardia baja.{/n} «¿Que si he...? ¡Eso sería una debilidad vergonzosa, prácticamente una herejía! Claro que no. Nací para esto. Vivo por la voluntad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} y en Su luz. Yo misma soy esa luz. Debo serlo, tanto para mí como para quienes piden mi protección».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}その質問はアルジェンタの意表をつくものだった。{/n}「これまでに…？だが、それは恥ずべき弱さであり、ほとんど異端のようなものだ！もちろんあるものか。私はこのために生まれてきたのだ。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の意志によって、皇帝の光の中で生きている。私自身が光であり、光でなければならない…私自身のために、そして私の保護を求める人々のために」
languages.original_text: {n}The question seems to catch Argenta off guard.{/n} "Have I ever...? But that would be shameful weakness, almost heresy! Of course not. I was born for this. I live by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."

traits.locale_text: {n}その質問はアルジェンタの意表をつくものだった。{/n}「これまでに…？だが、それは恥ずべき弱さであり、ほとんど異端のようなものだ！もちろんあるものか。私はこのために生まれてきたのだ。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の意志によって、皇帝の光の中で生きている。私自身が光であり、光でなければならない…私自身のために、そして私の保護を求める人々のために」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Frage scheint Argenta zu überrumpeln.{/n} "Ob ich mir je ...? Aber das wäre eine schändliche Schwäche, fast schon Ketzerei! Natürlich nicht. Ich bin für dieses Leben geboren. Ich lebe durch den Willen und im Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, ich selbst bin das Licht, ich muss das Licht sein — für mich und für jene, die um meinen Schutz bitten."
languages.original_text: {n}The question seems to catch Argenta off guard.{/n} "Have I ever...? But that would be shameful weakness, almost heresy! Of course not. I was born for this. I live by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frage scheint Argenta zu überrumpeln.{/n} "Ob ich mir je ...? Aber das wäre eine schändliche Schwäche, fast schon Ketzerei! Natürlich nicht. Ich bin für dieses Leben geboren. Ich lebe durch den Willen und im Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, ich selbst bin das Licht, ich muss das Licht sein — für mich und für jene, die um meinen Schutz bitten."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}La question semble prendre Argenta par surprise.{/n} « Si j'ai déjà... ? Il s'agirait là d'une honteuse faiblesse, à la limite de l'hérésie ! Bien sûr que non. Je suis née pour ça. C'est la volonté de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} qui régit ma vie et me permet d'incarner Sa lumière. Il s'agit de mon devoir. Envers moi-même, comme tous ceux qui réclament ma protection. »
languages.original_text: {n}The question seems to catch Argenta off guard.{/n} "Have I ever...? But that would be shameful weakness, almost heresy! Of course not. I was born for this. I live by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."

traits.locale_text: {n}La question semble prendre Argenta par surprise.{/n} « Si j'ai déjà... ? Il s'agirait là d'une honteuse faiblesse, à la limite de l'hérésie ! Bien sûr que non. Je suis née pour ça. C'est la volonté de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} qui régit ma vie et me permet d'incarner Sa lumière. Il s'agit de mon devoir. Envers moi-même, comme tous ceux qui réclament ma protection. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, sorduğun soruya karşı hazırlıksız yakalanmış gibi duruyor.{/n} "Yazgımı değiştirmek mi?.. Rezil bir âcizlik olur bu, hatta kâfirlik sayılır! Asla. Dünyaya geliş amacım budur. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} iradesiyle, O'nun ışığında yaşıyorum. Zatımın kendisi bu ışıktır, şahsımın ve benim himayemde olanların iyiliği için öyle olmak zorundadır."
languages.original_text: {n}The question seems to catch Argenta off guard.{/n} "Have I ever...? But that would be shameful weakness, almost heresy! Of course not. I was born for this. I live by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will and in His light, I myself am the light, I must be the light — for myself and for those who ask for my protection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, sorduğun soruya karşı hazırlıksız yakalanmış gibi duruyor.{/n} "Yazgımı değiştirmek mi?.. Rezil bir acizlik olur bu, hatta kâfirlik sayılır! Asla. Dünyaya geliş amacım bu. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un iradesiyle, O'nun ışığında yaşıyorum. Zatımın kendisi bu ışıktır, şahsımın ve benim himayemde olanların iyiliği için öyle olmak zorundadır."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
